ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: DDD worthless?  How would you change it?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... possible ... fairly ... Well I thought about it.  At best that 30 seconds will not gain you 400+ damage.  If you were using your chants during that 30
ygData.messageBody:
>>Okay - but the issue remains: How many people OTHER than Whee DON'T think
>>that DDD is useless?

>or this question: How many people have actually thought about the song and
possible
>ways that it is useful?
>30 seconds of ''cost'' time to get 400+ damage every 30 minutes or so seems
fairly
>useful to me.

Well I thought about it. At best that 30 seconds will not gain you 400+
damage. If you were using your chants during that 30 seconds, and counting
the best scenario where you lose 2 pulses of Frost, 3 pulses of Flame, and 4
pulses of Fulfill's you lose 350 damage from chants to gain 400 pts from
DDD. Since you really lose the full 5 pulses of each Chant, some on the
back side while you restart them, you actually lose 600+ pts of damage in 30
seconds. These numbers are just with a store bought drum. If you have even
a Nostrolo's tambourine you lose even more potential damage.

Taking that into account DDD is worse than useless if you have to mem it
every time you want to use it.

Kit
